name: .BZA File Extension
summary: Learn about .BZA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive file created by IZArc, a file compression and decompression program; contains one or more files that are compressed using BGA compression, which is an uncommon compression format; can be extracted to the original files using IZArc.

content: The BGA format supports another archiving method called "GZA," which uses the .GZA extension when created in IZArc.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
